title: God of the Last Minute
itunes:author: Guest: Shelia Erwin
itunes:summary:
Many times in Scripture, God did a miracle at what seemed like the last minute. But how do you respond when God doesn't answer a prayer for your child the way you'd hoped? John and Danny offer a word of encouragement for parents who are struggling to have hope. Featuring Sheila Erwin.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/parentingpodcast, or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive the book "Raising Up Dreamers" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofp-podcast-2022-03-01?refcd=1348705

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-parenting-podcast/god-of-the-last-minute/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/dreaming-with-your-child-digital-download?refcd=1348705

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
